name: Lust Goddess
description:
YOU'VE AWAKENED IN A FUTURE WORLD
As the Captain of a squad of mercenaries who are eager to serve you. Are you ready for the challenges you will face? Then go ahead and prove to them that you're the best Captain they've ever had!




SHOW YOUR DOMINANCE
Fight in exciting and colorful turn-based battles. The city is swarming with bandits who turn girls into sex slaves. Rescue the poor girls, and they will join your squad and show you their gratitude!




EARN THE LOVE OF YOUR MERCENARIES
Engage in juicy chats with your girls and receive their steamy photos. Each one of them has their own personality, likes and dislikes, and, of course, fetishes... They will be more than happy to bare it all before you!
